title: YouTube resolves issue that briefly impacted video streaming globally
byline: Alphabet-owned YouTube said on Wednesday (Oct 15) that it has resolved an issue impacting video streaming services for several thousand users globally.

title: Heavy showers above 100mm expected in parts of the island
byline: Showers or thundershowers will occur at most parts of the island after 1.00 p.m.

title: Sri Lanka’s manufacturing and services sectors expand in September 2025
byline: Sri Lanka’s Purchasing Managers’ Index (PMI) for September 2025 recorded growth in both manufacturing and services sectors.

title: Saudi crown prince announces major Mecca development
byline: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman announced on Wednesday the launch of King Salman Gate, a large mixed-use development in Mecca, Saudi Arabia.

title: Israel threatens to resume fighting if Hamas does not respect Gaza truce deal
byline: Israel’s defence minister on Wednesday (Oct 15) threatened to resume fighting if Hamas does not honour the terms of a US-backed ceasefire that halted the war in Gaza.

title: PM Harini to leave for India today
byline: Prime Minister Harini Amarasuriya is scheduled to undertake an official visit to India today.

title: PM Harini departs for India on an official visit
byline: Prime Minister Harini Amarasuriya has departed from the Katunayake International Airport on an official visit to India, according to airport officials.
